Description: Saturated hydraulic conductivity of the least transmissive layer when a water impermeable layer exists at a depth between 50 and 100 centimeters
Group D: <1 um/s (or depth to impermeable layer<50cm or water table<60cm)

Description: Saturated hydraulic conductivity of the least transmissive layer when any water impermeable layer exists at a depth greater than 100 centimeters
